product.title: Lambert - The Charlie Vegan Leather Bag in Black
product.body_html: We all love a multitasker that adapts to our lifestyle and this bag has it all. Made from premium, PETA-certified vegan leather, wear it as a backpack or a shoulder carrier by easily adjusting the straps. Features multiple inside pockets for plenty of storage. 27cm (height) x 22cm (width) x 10cm (depth).
